channel.title: [CFM] KT Cop Madness V1 - Signups - Royally Excused (Canned)
channel.description:
**Welcome to KT Cop Madness v1! It's a h̶e̶l̶l̶s̶t̶o̶r̶m very fun game you will all enjoy!**
Hosted by @KyoDaz and x.
This setup follows simple forum rules. I hope you are all aware of them by now. The setup will start once 10 players have signed up. Backups, spectators and co-hosts are appreciated.
**Gameplay**
Days will be 48 hours long, or shorter if someone is lynched. Nights will be 24 hours long or until everyone has submitted their actions. Actions are done by messaging me. You may pre-queue night actions during the day. Cops are unaware of their sanity. Cop sanities are hidden upon flip. You will be able to determine if they were a [color=gree]Town[/color] Cop or an Assassin however. [color=darkred]Mafia[/color] do not have a meeting. If a meeting is formed it they will be able to communicate at all times. [color=darkred]Mafia[/color] win the game when their numbers are equal to that of the Town. The [color=darkred]Mafia[/color] do not have a faction kill.
**Executions**
To accuse someone say "**/accuse [player]**" or "**/vote [player]**" Executions end the day. Executions will be absolute majority (1/2 of alive players + 1) + plurality. There must be a lynch everyday. If you can't decide then random.org will. Any no-lynches will always result in a random town member dying. If there is a tie between plurality lynches then one of them will be randomly lynched.
**After The Night**
You will be informed of feedback according to your action.
>*All* You slept peacefully. (No action)
>*Cop* Your target is a member of the [color=gree]Town[/color]! Your target is a member of the [color=darkred]Mafia[/color]!
>*Assassin* You successfully killed your target. Your target is a member of the [color=darkred]Mafia[/color]! You have joined a chat with them. *Player* is an assassin and attempted to attack you last night. You have joined a chat with them.
**KyoDaz's Twist (KT)**
KyoDaz's Twist is a modifier where I put my own seasoning on the setup. It's basically a modifier.
1) Journals are not present however your investigations will be logged and shown upon death. 2) [color=darkred]Mafia[/color] Assassins are exempt from having journals but may leave behind an assassin's note. (Sends a message to the other Assassin upon death provided they are not in a [color=darkred]Mafia[/color] chat. The note will not be revealed to [color=gree]Town[/color].) 3) Assassin is an original role made by me. It's very different as you all can tell. I didn't want to go for boring [color=darkred]Mafia[/color] Goons. 4) This setup is originally balanced as one vanilla mafia v 4 different cop sanities. The setup has been doubled to fit more players in.
**To Join**
To join, please '**/in**'
**Rolelist**
[color=darkred]Mafia Assassin[/color] [color=darkred]Mafia Assassin[/color] **[color=gree]Town Sane Cop[/color]** **[color=gree]Town Sane Cop[/color]** **[color=gree]Town Insane Cop[/color]** **[color=gree]Town Insane Cop[/color]** **[color=gree]Town Paranoid Cop[/color]** **[color=gree]Town Paranoid Cop[/color]** **[color=gree]Town Naive Cop[/color]** **[color=gree]Town Naive Cop[/color]**
**Role Cards**
[details="Cops"]
> # [color=gree]Town[/color] Cop > > > > You are a [color=gree]Town[/color] Cop. > Every night you may choose to investigate a player. You will learn if they are [color=gree]Town[/color] or [color=darkred]Mafia[/color]. > *Defeat anyone who dares to oppose the [color=gree]Town[/color].*
> # [color=gree]Town[/color] Sane Cop > > > > You are a [color=gree]Town[/color] Sane Cop. > Every night you may choose to investigate a player. You will learn if they are [color=gree]Town[/color] or [color=darkred]Mafia[/color]. > Appears to self as [color=gree]Town[/color] Cop. > *Defeat anyone who dares to oppose the [color=gree]Town[/color].*
> # [color=gree]Town[/color] Insane Cop > > > > You are a [color=gree]Town[/color] Insane Cop. > Every night you may choose to investigate a player. You will instead learn their opposite alignment. > Appears to self as [color=gree]Town[/color] Cop. > *Defeat anyone who dares to oppose the [color=gree]Town[/color].*
> # [color=gree]Town[/color] Paranoid Cop > > > > You are a [color=gree]Town[/color] Paranoid Cop. > Every night you may choose to investigate a player. You will always learn that they are a member of the [color=darkred]Mafia[/color]. > Appears to self as [color=gree]Town[/color] Cop. > *Defeat anyone who dares to oppose the [color=gree]Town[/color].*
> # [color=gree]Town[/color] Naive Cop > > > > You are a [color=gree]Town[/color] Naive Cop. > Every night you may choose to investigate a player. You will always learn that they are a member of the [color=gree]Town[/color]. > Appears to self as [color=gree]Town[/color] Cop. > *Defeat anyone who dares to oppose the [color=gree]Town[/color].*
[/details]
[details="Assassin"]
> # [color=darkred]Mafia[/color] Assassin > > > > You are a [color=darkred]Mafia Assassin[/color]. > You do not join the [color=darkred]Mafia[/color] meeting. The [color=darkred]Mafia[/color] in the meeting will be informed of your identity. > Every night you may choose to kill a player seperate from any other [color=darkred]Mafia[/color] kills. If they are a member of the [color=darkred]Mafia[/color] you will instead join their meeting. > *Defeat anyone who dares to oppose the [color=darkred]Mafia[/color].*
[/details]
Players:
1. Magnus - Alive 2. DirectorHail - Alive 3. SogMan - Alive 4. Andrej - Alive 5. SirDerpsAlot - Alive 6. Marshal - Alive 7. x - Alive 8. x - Alive 9. x - Alive 10. x - Alive
Backups:
1. x 2. x 3. x
Spectators:
1. DatBird 2. Jgoesgaming 3. x
